revisionDesc.change: Proofreading corrections, Walt's letters, date note, and Pendleton note.
Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
revised GWW and LOW wedding date note to read "spring 1871"
Review proofreading corrections; revise date note; annotate Edward and Emily Price marriage
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)

body.p:
well we have lived so far through the summer as you say i think last sunday Sunday was the hottest day we have had this summer at any rate i felt the heat more than any time yet i thought if i had much to doo do i couldent couldn't have done it as it was eddEdd went to church and George was away i had as much as i could doo do to get something for myself i thought of you i thought probably you was out somewhere where it was cooler than here it is as cool here as any place that is so far down town its being open in front makes it better it is comfortable to day i feel pretty well am thankfull thankful i am as well as i am) got your walterWalter dear with its contents all safe) hellenHelen Price was here yesterday she and her mother i expect over here the last of next week to make a vesit visit i hope the weather wont won't be so hot but i will try to make some preperation preparation before they come hellenHelen says when you come home she is coming over to tea one day and then you
can go home with her and stay all night mrsMrs. price has wrote to you hellenHelen says and she s she's wondering all the time why you dont don't write to her thinks waltWalt might send her a few lines) i beleive believe they think emmilyEmily will be married this fall they are a good family i think ellenHelen says the magic ruffle business is much better managed they have charged some of the persons to much better advantage so that mrsMrs. price will get in august about 500 dollar will get about that every six months) i expect georgeGeorge home next saturday Saturday i think probably he will stay as kingsleyKingsley wishes him to inspect the new main that is to be laid from east new york) i had a letter from mattyMatty since i wrote to you they seem to be all getting along very well wants some of you to come out there she says the works will be done and none of you will come to see it she said she was going to write to you that hattieHattie was much pleased with her letter and picture shows it to all the folks mattyMatty says hattyHattie is up to her shoulders i am sorry she grows up so tall she is only 9 years old

closer.salute: love to all and yourself waltWalt dear
